channel.title: Shift Manager of DOOM Part 2
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Shift Manager of DOOM Part 2" - I need some help with this mission.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of DOOM Part 2
item.content:encoded:
If I calculated correctly you only have 16 Range, which makes hard if not impossible to beat this mission. You should try to get more Range. Arena Items are very helpful, otherwise only Reglia or Polar Star would help since you haven't done Wasteland/Monochrome those items are not available.

I would suggest go Monochrome first and if at all possible get some arena items, otherwise I don't see you beating this mission.

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM Part 2
item.content:encoded:
Here are the items I have and I will be a Jonin in a day or two; I am a special Jonin in Taijutsu. What should I do besides getting the Parts to beat this mission?

Soul Glove
Professor's Hat
Blue Flower Hairpin
Heck Butterfly
Sword of the Reaper
